How It Works

Getting your Kuiper satellite internet installed is easy with our streamlined process

Get a Quote

Fill out our simple form with your installation details and receive a free quote instantly.

Match with a Pro

We connect you with a certified technician in your area who specializes in satellite installations.

Schedule Service

Choose a convenient time for your installation. Most appointments available within 48 hours.

Get Connected

Your technician completes the installation and ensures everything is working perfectly.

Professional Installation Services

From residential to commercial, we handle all types of Kuiper satellite installations

Residential Installation

Professional installation for homes, including roof and ground mounting options.

  • Roof mounting
  • Ground mounting
  • Cable routing
  • System activation

Commercial Installation

Enterprise-grade installations for businesses requiring reliable internet connectivity.

  • Multi-unit setup
  • Network integration
  • Backup systems
  • Priority support

Maintenance & Repair

Keep your system running smoothly with regular maintenance and quick repairs.

  • Troubleshooting
  • Realignment
  • Component replacement
  • Performance optimization
